features.text: Added ability to delete projects and boards.
Reworked subscription setup and management to be more intuitive.

bugs.text: When navigating away from a page, all relevant dialogs should now be properly closed.
Free plan limitations are now being enforced.
bugs.reasoning: Unfortunately, this needed to happen one day. Free plans are limited to 3 boards, and cannot collaborate with other users. For more details on our limitations and enforcement, please review our Terms of Service.

tweaks.text: Release notes stay open longer when there's a new release.
